item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: MPW (Medical Properties Trust, Inc.) Small Investors should consider healthcare REITs, particularly Medical Properties Trust, due to their recent outperformance and the potential for a promising upswing in home sales. GTES (Gates Industrial Corporation plc) Small Gates Industrial Corp PLC shows potential for growth with strong insider confidence and positive diversification recognition, but faces risks from secondary offering and industry competition.
